ygData.subject: Re: Tactics Soloing with Screaming Terror
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you miss understood the email when he said he would have time to cast 2-4 Darkness spells.  Basically the mob would be ST ed and stand there til it was
ygData.messageBody:
I think you miss understood the email when he said he would have time to
cast 2-4 Darkness spells. Basically the mob would be ST'ed and stand there
til it was damaged. Well you cast Darkness on it, if is sticks mob free
start kiting. If it is resisted no damage done to mob, mob still under ST.
Cast Darkness again, if sticks start kiting (since it slowed) if resisted no
damage to mob, mob still under ST. Basically what he was saying was that
with Screaming Terror you can kite a lot easier since you can usually get up
to 4 casts of darkness (since the resist rate is so bad on that line) before
the mob will start coming for you.

At 04:34 PM 12/8/99 EST, you wrote:
>From: TkAdam@...
>
>In a message dated 12/8/99 3:01:53 PM Eastern Standard Time,
>dicey@... writes:
>
>> I have read
>> that most seem to get 2-4 DoT's before it breaks.
>
>Just remember that this time you get to cast those spells is due to the stun
>effect which verant is removing. It will not stun, so you will break the ST
>instantly if you damage it (I.E. cast a DOT on it.)
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
